snippet: The Riverside Symphony ended its season on Thursday with a concert featuring 20th-century composers who embraced popular music, including Ravel and Peter Maxwell Davies.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance of 20th-century classical music by Riverside Symphony at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Riverside Symphony ended its season on Thursday with a concert featuring 20th-century composers who embraced popular music, including Ravel and Peter Maxwell Davies.

headline.seo: Riverside Symphony at Alice Tully Hall
headline.main: Four Classical Composers, Caught in Love Affairs With Popular Music
headline.print_headline: Four Classical Composers, Caught in Love Affairs With Popular Music
